name: @uniswap/merkle-distributor
description: ğŸ“¦ A smart contract that distributes a balance of tokens according to a merkle root

scripts.generate-merkle-root:sepolia: INPUT_FILE=input_lists/sepolia.json env-cmd -f sepolia.env hardhat run --network sepolia scripts/generate-merkle-root.ts
scripts.deploy-merkle-root:sepolia: INPUT_FILE=input_lists/sepolia.json DEPLOY=true env-cmd -f sepolia.env hardhat run --network sepolia scripts/generate-merkle-root.ts
scripts.generate-merkle-root:avalanche-vaults: INPUT_FILE=input_lists/avalanche_vault.json env-cmd -f avalanche.env hardhat run --network avalanche scripts/generate-merkle-root.ts
scripts.generate-merkle-root:mainnet: INPUT_FILE=input_lists/mainnet.json env-cmd -f mainnet.env hardhat run --network mainnet scripts/generate-merkle-root.ts
INPUT_FILE=input_lists/tree.json env-cmd -f mainnet.env hardhat run --network mainnet scripts/generate-merkle-root.ts
scripts.deploy-merkle-root:mainnet: INPUT_FILE=input_lists/mainnet.json DEPLOY=true env-cmd -f mainnet.env hardhat run --network mainnet scripts/generate-merkle-root.ts
